resources.string: Allow the app %1$s to access the USB device?
Allow the app %1$s to access the USB accessory?
No installed apps work with this USB accessory. Learn more about this accessory at %1$s
Install Android File Transfer app for Mac
"Access them anytime by swiping down. Swipe down again for system controls."
Enabling Extended Standby Mode in Power management will optimize battery lifetime
Disabling Auto-sync will conserve data and battery usage, but you will need to sync each account manually to collect recent information. And you will not receive notifications when updates occur.

"Any changes you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your phone.
Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes you make on the phone to the web.
To choose what kinds of data you sync for each account, go to Settings > Accounts."

"Any changes you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your device.
Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes you make on the device to the web.
To choose what kinds of data you sync for each account, go to Settings > Accounts.
Data charges may apply when updating your device. An unlimited data plan is recommended."
